name: Fruit slice & splash! nibblers
description:
Use the power of pen with arch to slice the fruits!
Splash maximum fruits with in given time and collect some awesome rewards.
Use the unique powers of each ben to destroy the different fruits. If you get stuck in the game, you can use the collected coins to save your life!

See if you can become leading star.


Don't forget to leave a feedback to make the game better.
